name: The Lonely Knight (CY3OR6)
description:
READ ME 

A knight started wandering outside at night and came upon a dungeon.Hoping he might find treasures there ,he entered the dungeon .Where will this adventure take him. ??

Controls: 

W- Up

S-Down

A-Left 

D-Right 

M-Map 

This game is about exploration.To win this game you need to go to all yellow rooms.In some levels a blue room will spawn in that room you will find different coloured orbs,but BEWARE. The red room will be the end point of the level.

We hope you enjoy our first game and its a delightful and enjoyable experience for you.From our whole team thank you for playing our game.We are looking forward to your feedback.

NOW LET YOUR ADVENTURE BEGIN KNIGHT.
